EmailTemplate.name: Denied Email Training
EmailTemplate.subject: Class Registration Error
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Our records show you do not qualify* for {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Name__c} on {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Start_DateTime__c} - {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_End_DateTime__c} with the Imagine Institute.
If you feel this is an error please call us at 206-492-5249 or email training@imaginewa.org.
Thank you,
-The Imagine Institute
www.imaginewa.org
* Providers that qualify for The Imagine Institute classes must have in their care during the time of training at least one state subsidized child. Only Licensed Family Child Care Providers (LFCCP) and Family, Friends and Neighbor (FFN) providers qualify for our free training classes.
You can not take the same class more than once in a fiscal year, July 1 to June 20.
----
Nuestros archivos indican que no califica* para {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Name__c} en {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_Start_DateTime__c} - {!CampaignMember.c501_cm__Training_End_DateTime__c} con El Instituto Imagine.
Si ud cree que es un error favor de comunicarse al 206-492-5249 O por correo electronico training@imaginewa.org.
-El Instituto Imagine
www.imaginewa.org
*Proveedoras que califican para las clases con el Instituto deben estar ofreciendo cuidado durante el tiempo de capacitacion al menos un ni침o subsidiado por el estado. Solo proveedoras con Licensia de cuidado de ni침os (LFCCP), Vecinos, amigos y familiars (FFN) califican para nuestros entrenamientos gratis.
No puede tomar la misma clase m치s de una vez en un a침o fiscal, del 1 de julio al 20 de junio.
